contents.Text: The main window is the central hub of RhythmiRust, providing access to all major features and controls.
Buttons on the taskbar at the top of the screen in order from left to right are:
Where you can enter queries and view search results for your music.
Save and organise your frequently played tracks for quick access.
View your recently played tracks and previous sessions.
Control playback, view currently playing track, and manage your song queue.
Download music directly from supported websites.
Configure app preferences and customize your experience.
